## Examples

The examples are the fastest way to get started with GemBox.Presentation.
To see the live examples and demos, go to:
https://www.gemboxsoftware.com/presentation/examples

To download the examples C# and VB.NET projects, go to GitHub:
https://github.com/GemBoxLtd/GemBox.Presentation.Examples

## License

In the static constructor of your main project class, add the following line:

```
ComponentInfo.SetLicense("FREE-LIMITED-KEY")
```

If you purchased the Professional version, replace `"FREE-LIMITED-KEY"` with your Professional serial key.
You need to call the `SetLicense()` method before using any other member from GemBox.Presentation.

## Support

On the following page, you can find detailed documentation and API reference:
https://www.gemboxsoftware.com/presentation/docs/introduction.html

On the following page, you can find additional support options:
https://www.gemboxsoftware.com/presentation/support
